org.xflatdb.xflat.convert.converters

Class XStreamPojoConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.convert.converters.XStreamPojoConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PojoConverter

    public class XStreamPojoConverter
extends Object
implements PojoConverter
    A PojoConverter that uses XStream for marshalling and unmarshalling.
    Author:
    Gordon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XStreamPojoConverter()
      Creates a new XStream instance with the default options.
      XStreamPojoConverter(com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream xstream, boolean isThreadSafe)
      Creates a pojo converter that uses the given configured XStream instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XStreamPojoConverter

        public XStreamPojoConverter()
        Creates a new XStream instance with the default options. This instance is not thread safe on serializing new objects, since it relies on annotation processing.

      • XStreamPojoConverter

        public XStreamPojoConverter(com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream xstream,
                    boolean isThreadSafe)
        Creates a pojo converter that uses the given configured XStream instance.

        From the XStream documentation: 

         The XStream instance is thread-safe. That is, once the XStream instance has been created and configured,
 it may be shared across multiple threads allowing objects to be serialized/deserialized concurrently. 
 Note, that this only applies if annotations are not auto-detected on -the-fly.
        Therefore, if you are using annotations to control serialization, ensure that you set "isThreadSafe" to false.
        Parameters:
        xstream -

    • Method Detail

      • getXStream

        public com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream getXStream()
        Gets the XStream instance that performs the POJO mapping.
        Returns:

      • extend

        public ConversionService extend(ConversionService service)
        Description copied from interface: PojoConverter
        Extends the given conversion service to provide it the ability to convert POJOs. This can be done by adding converters or by returning a new conversion service chained to the given one.
        Specified by:
        extend in interface PojoConverter
        Parameters:
        service - The current conversion service used by the database.
        Returns:
        The new conversion service that the database should use.
